changeSet.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('FFF_STAGING.MULTIVARIATE_THRESHOLDS', 'U') IS NULL CREATE TABLE FFF_STAGING.MULTIVARIATE_THRESHOLDS ( ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL CONSTRAINT DF_MULTIVARIATE_ID DEFAULT NEWID(), CENTRE NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, CRITICAL_CONDITION_ID NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, INPUT_LOCATION_ID NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, OUTPUT_LOCATION_ID NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, TARGET_AREA_CODE NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, INPUT_PARAMETER_ID NVARCHAR(64) NOT NULL, LOWER_BOUND_INCLUSIVE BIT NOT NULL, LOWER_BOUND DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL, UPPER_BOUND_INCLUSIVE BIT NOT NULL, UPPER_BOUND DECIMAL(5,2) NOT NULL, PRIORITY INT NOT NULL, CONSTRAINT PK_MULTIVARIATE_THRESHOLDS PRIMARY KEY CLUSTERED([ID]) )

rollback.sql: IF OBJECT_ID('FFF_STAGING.MULTIVARIATE_THRESHOLDS', 'U') IS NOT NULL DROP TABLE FFF_STAGING.MULTIVARIATE_THRESHOLDS
